About the Concordia Presidential Scholarship 2024

Country: Canada

University Name: Concordia University, Canada

Degree Level: Bachelor, Master, Ph.D., Diploma, and Certificate programs

Financial Coverage: Fully Funded

Scholarship Coverage

At Concordia University, competitive funding packages are offered at the time of admission to most students to allow them to focus on their research and studies.

  • Concordia University Presidential Scholarships: Covers the full costs of Tuition and Fees, Books, and Residence and Meal Plan fees. (Visit here)
  • New: 2024-23 Top Concordia Undergraduate Graduate Entrance Scholarships, valued at $10,000.
  • Concordia University Doctoral Graduate Fellowships: valued at $14,000 per year for four years.
  • Concordia International Tuition Award of Excellence: the award value is paying tuition fees at the Quebec rate. Valued at approximately $39,280.
  • Concordia Merit Scholarship: valued at $10,000.

Applicants are automatically considered for all Concordia entrance scholarships through the individual faculty’s graduate admissions office.

How Concordia Presidential Scholarship 2024 works for International Students

Concordia Presidential Scholarship is a merit-based scholarship for international students. The Concordia Presidential Scholarship is available to both domestic and international students who are applying to study at Concordia University. The scholarship is awarded to incoming undergraduate students who demonstrate exceptional academic achievement and leadership potential.

International students are required to meet the same eligibility criteria and application requirements as domestic students to be considered for the scholarship. However, international students may need to provide additional documentation, such as proof of English language proficiency, and may be subject to different tuition fees than domestic students.

International students who are awarded the Concordia Presidential Scholarship will receive the same benefits as domestic recipients, which include financial support for tuition fees, a living allowance, and opportunities for academic and leadership development.

Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible for this scholarship for International students, you must fulfill the following criteria.

  • Must be an international student or Canadian Student, International or Domestic.
  • Applicants must be enrolled full-time in a study program throughout their studies at the Université de Montréal.

Concordia University Application Portal

The Concordia University application portal is the online platform that applicants use to submit their applications and required documents, and check the status of their applications. The application portal can be accessed through the university’s website, and applicants can create an account to start their application, save their progress, and submit their application when they are ready.

Concordia University Application Portal Login Page

To log in to the Concordia University application portal, you will need to visit the university’s website and click on the “Apply Now” button. This will take you to the application portal login page, where you can enter your username and password to access your application. If you have not created an account yet, you can do so by clicking on the “Create Account” button and following the prompts to set up your account.

Concordia University Tuition Fees

Concordia University is a public university located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The tuition fees for international students vary depending on the program of study, level of study, and residency status.

For the 2024 academic year, the estimated annual tuition fees for international undergraduate students range from CAD 22,800 to CAD 39,400, depending on the program. For international graduate students, the estimated annual tuition fees range from CAD 17,900 to CAD 26,400, depending on the program.

After the Concordia Presidential Scholarships Application, What Next

After submitting your application for the Concordia Presidential Scholarship, the university will review your application and make a decision on whether to offer you the scholarship. If you are selected as a recipient of the scholarship, you will be notified by the university.

If you are not selected for the scholarship, you may still be eligible for other forms of financial aid or scholarships offered by the university or other organizations. It’s recommended that you check with Concordia’s Financial Aid and Awards Office to explore other funding opportunities.

If you are offered the Concordia Presidential Scholarship, you will need to follow the instructions provided by the university to accept the scholarship and enroll at the university. The scholarship typically covers tuition fees and provides a living allowance, but may also come with additional requirements such as maintaining a certain grade point average or participating in leadership activities.

Top Fully Funded Scholarships to Study in Canada 2024

Concordia University Financial Aid or Scholarships

Concordia University offers a variety of financial aid and scholarships to help students cover the cost of tuition and living expenses. Here are some examples:

Entrance Scholarships:

These scholarships are awarded to students who demonstrate exceptional academic achievement in high school. They range in value from $1,000 to $10,000.

In-course Scholarships:

These scholarships are awarded to current Concordia students who demonstrate academic excellence. They range in value from $500 to $5,000.

Work-study Program:

This program provides part-time employment opportunities on campus to help students earn money to cover their expenses.

Bursaries:

These are need-based awards that are provided to students who demonstrate financial need.

Government Financial Aid:

Concordia University participates in various government financial aid programs, including the Canada Student Loans Program and the Quebec Loans and Bursaries Program.

External Scholarships:

Concordia University has partnerships with various external organizations that offer scholarships to students.

It’s recommended that students check Concordia’s Financial Aid and Awards Office website for more information on the various financial aid and scholarship opportunities available and to learn about the application process.
